Package ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorAnswerActivity
    A view class that allows a user to edit text and submit it as an answer to a question.
    AuthorQuestionActivity
    This view allows the user to create a question.
    AuthorReplyActivity
    A view class that allows a user to edit text and submit it as a reply to a question or answer.
    BuildConfig  
    CreateAccountActivity
    An activity that allows the user to create a new account and log into it.
    CustomActivity
    An activity used as a starting point for all activities within the application.
    HomeActivity
    This class handles the Activity of the main page which acts as a hub for displaying questions taken from the server and displaying the button to ask a question.
    LoginActivity
    An activity that allows the user to log in to an account.
    MyAnswersActivity
    This class is a view class that displays the questions which contain user authored answers It contains various menu items options which can be selected from this activity page The user can select to view each of the answers and replies corresponding to each question in the list.
    MyFavouritesActivity
    Displays the list of all questions the user has favourited.
    MyHistoryActivity
    This class handles displaying the populated list of every question that is clicked on by the user in the main list of questions from the server.
    MyQuestionsActivity
    This class is a view class that displays the questions that the user asked in the application It contains various menu items options which can be selected from this activity page The user can select to view each of the answers and replies corresponding to each question in the list
    QuestionPageActivity
    A view class that displays the question and all it's attributes Allows users to see a question that has been created as well as all the answers associated with the question.
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    ReadingListActivity
    This is a view class that displays all of the questions that a user has added to their Reading List (Type: ArrayList) The question list displays all of the components associated with a question (eg: title, body, rating, number of answers etc) The user can chose to select a question to view the answers and replies associated with it
    ReplyPageActivity
    A view class that displays the replies corresponding to either an answer or a question It contains various menu items options which can be selected from this activity page The user can see the reply body, date, and author's username The user can also see the information associated with an answer or a question, depending on which parent the replies belong to
    SearchActivity
    This is a view class that displays the results of a search that the user initiated Will be implemented for Project Part-4
    ShowPhoto
    Class that is used to display the Photos of Questions or Answers
